title.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIUB) Advanced Course, Peru

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIUB) Advanced Course, Peru; This course supplements instruction provided during the SIU Basic Course and provides additional instruction on several aspects of conducting a judicial wire intercept investigation. These include undercover operations, advanced operational planning, tactical entries, confidential Source management, and money laundering

title.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIUF) Basic Course, Peru

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIUF) Basic Course, Peru; This is a five week course serves as the foundation in fundamental law enforcement practices for newly assigned officers. It is based on the DEA Basic Agent training program and covers a wide range of topics in drug law enforcement.

title.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU 6) Advanced Course, Peru

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU 6) Advanced Course, Peru; This one-week advanced training course is designed for SIU commanders responsible for supervising units. The course addresses all core topics from a SIU managers perspective which includes the following; management of SIU, DEA oversight of program, operational planning, critical incident response, risk management, officer safety, leadership, ethics and professionalism in law enforcement, confidential source management, the supervision of enforcement operations, as well as the identification of trends associated with narco-terrorism. The course is conducted via a workshop environment and also encourages SIU commanders and DEA management to exchange information in order to make important decisions needed to improve the SIU program

sector.narrative: Stabilization Operations and Security Sector Reform
